Intervention: Paclitaxel 90 milligrams per square metre (mg/m2) administered intravenously (IV) on days 1, 8, 15 every 28 days followed by bevacizumab 10 milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg) administered intravenously on days 1 and 15 every 28 days

Paclitaxel 90 milligrams per square metre (mg/m2) administered intravenously (IV) on days 1, 8, 15 every 28 days followed by gemcitabine 1500 mg/m2 IV on days 1 and 15 every 28 days followed by bevacizumab 10 milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg) administered intravenously on days 1 and 15 every 28 days
Eligibility: Women diagnosed with breast cancer and cancer spread to areas far away from the breast or organs.
Must be able to measure the disease by specific medical parameters
May have received treatment for breast cancer at the beginning of the disease
• May be limited in physically difficult activity but able to perform light work.
• Must have an adequate organ function as seen in the blood test results.
The cancer that spread to the brain.
• Treatment of breast cancer after the disease has considered spreading to other regions or organs.
Unable to agree on study requirements
Results: Response defined by the criteria for assessing response in solid tumours (RCIST): complete response (CR)=disappearance of all target lesions; partial response (PR) = 30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; progressive disease = 20% increase in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; stable disease = small changes that do not meet the above criteria.
Time frame: start and every 2 cycles (approximately 8 weeks) of treatment for measured progressive disease (PD) and post-therapy until initiation of DP or other treatment (up to 35 months)

Paclitaxel 90 milligrams per square metre (mg/m2) administered intravenously (IV) on days 1, 8, 15 every 28 days followed by bevacizumab 10 milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg) administered intravenously on days 1 and 15 every 28 days
Unit of measure: proportion of respondents 0.489 (0.385 to 0.595)
- Arm/group title: Paclitaxel Plus Bevacizumab Plus Gemmitabine (PB+G)

Paclitaxel 90 milligrams per square metre (mg/m2) administered intravenously (IV) on days 1, 8, 15 every 28 days followed by gemcitabine 1500 mg/m2 IV on days 1 and 15 every 28 days followed by bevacizumab 10 milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg) administered intravenously on days 1 and 15 every 28 days
Unit of measure: proportion of responders 0.587 (0.479 to 0.689)
